mapper.insert: insert into invite (channel_id, sender, recipient) values (#{channel_id},#{sender},#{recipient})
mapper.select: select *,name as channel_name from invite join channel on invite.channel_id = channel.id where recipient = #{recipient} and invite_state = 'STAND_BY'
mapper.update: update invite set invite_state = #{invite_state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select exists (select * from invite where channel_id = #{channel_id} and recipient = #{recipient} and invite_state = 'STAND_BY' )
mapper.delete: delete from invite where channel_id = #{channel_id} and recipient = #{email}
